title: Modern France: the land and the people
brief_description: A brief geographical survey of modern France. Covers wheat farming in the North; flower gathering and orange growing on the Riviera; vineyards around Bordeaux; life at the port of Bordeaux; travel by barge on the Seine to Paris; the markets and shops of Paris; a steel-mill in Nancy.
